name: K1 De Ultimate M.O.N
description: '''Wasiu Omogbolahan Olasunkanmi Adewale Ayinde Marshal''' {{post-nominals|country=NG|MON}} (born 3 March 1957), known professionally as '''K1 De Ultimate''', is a Nigerian [[Fuji music|Fuji]] musician. He popularised a brand of the genre based on the work of its creator, [[Ayinde Barrister]], known as "Talazo Fuji".
